name: Inmortis
description:
Inmortis

Inmortis is a 2.5d action-rpg in pixel art. In Inmortis realm you'll have to face fights, death and most of all corruption wich is omnipresent in this world. Some will try to face it others will accept this fate wich can be a good one. What will you decide ?

Choose your weapons

Choose between different types of weapon and pass through the hive forest. You can try to seek for help but you knows what lurks in the dark...

Face corruptions

Be cautious in this twisted place corruption is everywhere and everyone is affected. If you are lucky gods will may bless you, but every blessing can turn into a curse



And now ? Do you think you're ready for the hive forest ?
